name: ExelMart
overview:
ExelMart.com is an online marketplace which brings together multiple sellers and makes it easier for them to communicate and trade. Exelmart.com provides a SaaS (Software as a Service) based platform to merchants where they can get a complete set of features to create & manage their online stores. Merchants can showcase their products in effective manner and sell them online with different payment options such as- cash on delivery (COD), debit & credit card payment etc. It gives user a platform to shop online through different merchants.

In recent years, Internet virtualy has become major driving force of economic and technological growth in many industries. Born with the idea of empowering small merchants and businesses in terms of technology, exelmart.com comes up with unique offerings. It offers merchants a professionally looking e-commerce website with all the latest features like image zooming option, shopping cart etc. It provides merchants an effective back-end tool or a control panel which serves as a store manager for their online stores.

With this effective and very easy to use online store manager, merchants can manage their entire online stores like adding new products and categories, updating stock, managing inventory, viewing and managing orders etc, without any specific technical knowledge.
